answers.author: Evelina Moulder
answers.text:
Quite a few local governments that responded to the Sustainability survey indicated that they have policies in place. They include Asheville, NC; Maple Grove, MN; Hemet, CA; and Tracy, CA. You can contact members in those cities through the "Who's Who." Their activities relate to new government construction projects, retrofits, permitting higher density development, etc., so I'm sure they can help you.
Best regards,

author: Sharon Ergler
text: State College Borough is looking for enacted zoning ordinances that regulate green practices ether as a mandate or voluntary.  Interested in ordinances that do or do not rely on LEED certification. Please contact Anne Messner at amessner@statecollegepa.us.
title: Zoning Ordinances that Regulate Green Practices
